00034 #include <exception>
00035 #include <iostream>
00036 #include <cerrno>
00037 #include <unistd.h>
00038 #include <vector>
00039 
00040 #include "cvq.h"
00041 
00042 using namespace std;
00043 
00044 const char *me = NULL;
00045 /*
00046  *
00047  */
00048 void usage()
00049 {
00050     cerr<<"usage: "<<me<< " [-a] (domain){1,}"<<endl
00051         <<"\t-a\tall domains"<<endl
00052         <<endl
00053         <<"Program shows IP addresses assiociated with given domains'"<<endl
00054         <<"names."<<endl;
00055 }
00056 
00057 /*
00058  *
00059  */
00060 void show( const string & dom, const vector<string> & ips ) 
00061 {
00062     vector<string>::size_type i, cnt=ips.size();
00063     for(i=0; i < cnt; i++ )
00064             cout<<dom<<':'<<ips[i]<<endl;
00065 }
00066 
00067 /*
00068  *
00069  */
00070 int main(int ac, char **av)
00071 {
00072     me = *av;
00073     try {
00074             int opt;
00075             bool all=false;
00076             while( (opt=getopt(ac,av,"ah")) != -1 ) {
00077                     switch(opt) {
00078                     case 'a':
00079                             all = true;
00080                             break;
00081                     default:        
00082                     case '?':
00083                     case 'h':
00084                             usage();
00085                             return(1);
00086                     }
00087             }
00088             ac -= optind;
00089             av += optind;
00090 
00091             cvq *vq(cvq::alloc());
00092 
00093             char ret;
00094             vector<string> ips;
00095             vector<string> dom;
00096             if( all ) {
00097                     if(ac) {
00098                             usage();
00099                             return(1);
00100                     }
00101                     if((ret=vq->dom_ip_ls_dom(dom))) {
00102                             cout<<"Can't get domain list: "<<vq->err_report()<<endl;
00103                             return ret;
00104                     }
00105             } else {
00106                     if(!ac) {
00107                             usage();
00108                             return(1);
00109                     }
00110                     dom.reserve(ac);
00111                     for(int i=0; i < ac; i++ ) {
00112                             dom.push_back(av[i]);
00113                     }
00114             }
00115             for(vector<string>::size_type i=0, s=dom.size(); i < s; i++ ) {
00116                     if((ret=vq->dom_ip_ls(dom[i], ips))) {
00117                             cout<<"Can't get ip list: "<<vq->err_report()<<endl;
00118                             return ret;
00119                     } else {
00120                             show(dom[i], ips);
00121                     }
00122             }
00123     } catch( const exception & e ) {
00124             cerr << "exception: " << e.what() << endl;
00125             return 1;
00126     }
00127     return 0;
00128 }
